title: Information Hygiene for the COVID-19 Infodemic
description: Clear and comprehensive set of easily-implemented tips for navigating information about COVID-19 online.

title: Stigma and Resilience
description: CDC guidance on countering stigma and sharing accurate information during public health emergencies.

title: Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) advice for the public: Myth busters
description: Information from the World Health Organization on debunking COVID-19 myths.

title: Elsevier’s Novel Coronavirus Information Center
description: Elsevier’s non-paywalled archive of health and medical research on novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV).

title: The Lancet Coronavirus Resource Centre
description: The Lancet's non-paywalled resource centre brings together new 2019 novel coronavirus disease (COVID-19) content from across The Lancet journals as it is published.

title: The New England Journal of Medicine Coronavirus (COVID-19) Information
description: A non-paywalled collection of articles and other resources on the Coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak, including clinical reports, management guidelines, and commentary.

title: Oxford University Press Free Access to Resources on Coronavirus
description: Oxford University Press' non-paywalled content to assist researchers, medical professionals, policy makers, and others who are working to address this potential health crisis.

title: Springer Nature Group SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19 Information
description: Springer's non-paywalled access to COVID-19 related research articles from Springer journals, as well as additional commentary and relevant ebooks.

title: SSRN Coronavirus and Infectious Disease Research
description: SSRN’s non-paywalled Coronavirus and Infectious Disease Research page provides a curated view into the early-stage research to help researchers, public health authorities, clinicians and the public understand, contain and manage this disease.

title: Wiley's Novel Coronavirus Resources & News
description: Wiley's non-paywalled information about COVID-19 free to access. In addition to articles related to the current outbreak, Wiley is also making a collection of journal articles and our book chapters on coronavirus research freely available to the global scientific community.

title: Coronavirus Site (Clarivate Analytics)
description: Selected complimentary access to research published on the Coronavirus (COVID-19) from Clarivate Analytics, including some articles from the Web of Science.

title: Statista Report - The coronavirus disease (COVID-19) outbreak 2019-20
description: This dossier provides some of the most recent data relating to the ongoing coronavirus disease (COVID-19) outbreak.

title: Wolters Kluwer COVID-19 resources
description: "Resources to support rapid response healthcare teams and researchers working to address the global coronavirus" including open articles, updates, and an article feed

title: State of Idaho Official COVID-19 Resources Page
description: Official Idaho page for updates and information regading the state response to the COVID-19 situation

title: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
description: The CDC's portal for updates, educational information, and situation-specific resources relating to COVID-19

title: World Health Organization
description: Ongoing updates tracking the situation internationally
